pr_title: New module for user virtual attribute sponsoredMembershipInOrganizations

timeline.bodyHTML:
NIT: This is just to show, how this could be done with the Java8 stream API (even though I know you will probably not like it 😉) If you would like to, you can implement it like this.

	private List<String> getSponsorOrganizationIdentifiersFromGroups(PerunSessionImpl sess, User user) {
		return sess.getPerunBl().getMembersManagerBl().getMembersByUserWithStatus(sess, user, Status.VALID).stream()
			.flatMap(m -> sess.getPerunBl().getGroupsManagerBl().getGroupsWhereMemberIsActive(sess, m).stream())
			.map(g -> getOrganizationIdentifierAttribute(sess, g, user))
			.filter(Objects::nonNull)
			.map(Attribute::valueAsString)
			.filter(Objects::nonNull)
			.distinct()
			.collect(Collectors.toList());
	}

	private Attribute getOrganizationIdentifierAttribute(PerunSessionImpl sess, Group group, User user) {
		try {
			return sess.getPerunBl().getAttributesManagerBl().getAttribute(sess, group, A_G_D_sponsorOrganizationIdentifier);
		} catch (WrongAttributeAssignmentException e) {
			throw new InternalErrorException("Wrong assignment of " + A_G_D_sponsorOrganizationIdentifier + " for user " + user.getId(), e);
		} catch (AttributeNotExistsException e) {
			log.debug("Attribute " + A_G_D_sponsorOrganizationIdentifier + " of group " + group.getId() + " does not exist, values will be skipped", e);
		}
		return null;
	}
timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

replies.bodyText: Why not. Lets go to the future 😅 Changed.
replies.author: stavamichal

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
sess = mock(PerunSessionImpl.class);
PerunBl perunBl = mock(PerunBl.class);
when(sess.getPerunBl()).thenReturn(perunBl);
AttributesManagerBl am = mock(AttributesManagerBl.class);
GroupsManagerBl gm = mock(GroupsManagerBl.class);
MembersManagerBl mm = mock(MembersManagerBl.class);
when(sess.getPerunBl().getAttributesManagerBl()).thenReturn(am);
when(sess.getPerunBl().getGroupsManagerBl()).thenReturn(gm);
when(sess.getPerunBl().getMembersManagerBl()).thenReturn(mm);
sess = mock(PerunSessionImpl.class, RETURNS_DEEP_STUBS);
timeline.author: Vojtech-Sassmann

timeline.body: NIT: It would be more readable if you would split these lines at the `.thenReturn` call.

replies.bodyText: I like it this way more, but don't have a problem to change that. Done.

timeline.message:
New module for user virtual attribute sponsoredMembershipInOrganizations

 - new module for user virtual attribute which return list of all values
 of group attribute sponsorOrganizationIdentifier in every group where
 user has valid member (is active - valid in group and vo).
 - add simple test for module
